===Overview===
The '''Sylandans ''' are one of the various [[human]] tribes descended from the ancient [[Atlantis|Atlanteans]]. The Sylandans live in the city of glass [[Sylanda]] in the [[Mountain of Darkness]], which is located tin the [[Savage Land]]. They cling to their old Atlantean ways. Their technology level is quite high as they have salvaged equipment from their ancestors.{{r|Savage Tales #7}}

===Events===
The Sylandans use the [[Water of Life]] to cure all diseases. They were known for their cures and treated the people of the Savage Land for centuries. They met [[Ka-Zar]] and [[Rhyla (Earth-616)|Rhyla]] in search of a remedy against the plague. The city Sylanda was later damaged by a large [[dinosaur]].{{r|Savage Tales #7}}
